path.style: fill: none; fill-opacity: 0.75; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1.875; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1.875; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

rect.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 191, 201); fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1.875; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1;

opacity: 1; fill: rgb(139, 239, 145); fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1.875; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1;

path.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 138); fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1.875; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; text-align: center; line-height: 125%; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; font-family: Arial;

font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; text-align: center; line-height: 125%; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; font-family: Arial;
